manifest.name: @expo/vector-icons
manifest.description: Built-in support for popular icon fonts and the tooling to create your own Icon components from your font and glyph map. This is a wrapper around react-native-vector-icons to make it compatible with Expo.

scripts.build: EXPO_NONINTERACTIVE=1 expo-module build && npm run generate-lazy && npm run copy-vendor
scripts.prepare: expo-module prepare && npm run generate-lazy && npm run copy-vendor
